metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28288 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
[Unknown description]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-28288` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 99.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.2
firefox-geckodriver - 99.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 99.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: tyhicks> mozjs contains a copy of the SpiderMonkey JavaScript engine

criterions.comment: firefox package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '99.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.2').
mozjs78 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
